title: You really want to click this. So do it.
body:
Good. You satiated your thirst/hunger (depends on how you roll I guess)

Now.

Correct me If I am wrong, but I don't think there are any skins centered around money.
I'm talking like **DOLLAHZ MAYN!**
but seriously tho, why is that?

I really can't think of someone who it could work for except Ryze and twisted Fate, but both have a crap ton of skins already, so......

Could be for Draaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaven I suppose. Because why not.

replies.body:
I came up with Federal Reserve {{champion:4}}

the money burns as it leaves his fingers
Yeh, I thought of something like this, but TF has alot of skins
He already has legendary E-sport Primetime Draven, so I think this says enough.
